{{Infobox political party | country = Egypt | party_name = The Free Republican Party | native_name = Al-Hizb al-Gomhory al-Ahrar
Ø§ÙØ­Ø²Ø¨ Ø§ÙØ¬ÙÙÙØ±Ù Ø§ÙØ­Ø± | chairman = | foundation = 2006 | headquarters = [[Cairo]] | ideology = [[Liberal Democracy]] | newspaper = | website = | colorcode = black }} The '''Free Republican Party''' or '''Al-Hizb al-Gomhory al-Ahrar''' ({{lang-ar|Ø§ÙØ­Ø²Ø¨ Ø§ÙØ¬ÙÙÙØ±Ù Ø§ÙØ­Ø±}}) is a [[political party]] in [[Egypt]]. The Free Republican Party might be considered as a [[liberal parties|liberal party]]. == Platform == * Upholding Islamic Sharia as the main source of legislation. * Supporting Egypt's right to sovereignty over its territories and national waters and upholds the country's historical right to the leadership of both the Arab and Islamic regions. * Underlining the need to maintaining Egypt's social fabric and promotes equality between Egyptians. * Upholding political freedoms and human rights and endorses respect of the Constitution and the rule of the law. * Advocating multi-partisanship. * Supporting free education, social solidarity and social justice. * Supporting state-provided mother, child and youth care. * Advocating the elimination of economic monopolies. * Advocating separation of the legislative, judicial and executive authorities. * Advocating integration with the Arab world and the reviving of Arab nationalism. == See also == *[[Liberalism]] *[[Contributions to liberal theory]] *[[Liberalism worldwide]] *[[List of liberal parties]] *[[Liberal democracy]] *[[Liberalism in Egypt]] == External links == *[http://www2.sis.gov.eg/En/Politics/Parties/Parties/041102000000000024.htm The Free Republican Party on Egypt State Information Service (SIS)] {{Egyptian political parties}} [[Category:Liberal parties]] [[Category:Political parties in Egypt]] [[Category:Political parties established in 2006]] {{liberalparty-stub}} {{Egypt-party-stub}} [[ar:Ø§ÙØ­Ø²Ø¨ Ø§ÙØ¬ÙÙÙØ±Ù Ø§ÙØ­Ø±]]
